conventionDeclaration.citation: ISAAR(CPF): International Standard Archival Authority Record for Corporate Bodies, Persons and Families, International Council on Archives (2nd edition, 2003); Rules for the construction of personal, place and corporate names, National Council on Archives (1997).

maintenanceEvent.agent: Florence Clavaud (ICA/EGAD member | Archives nationales de France)

biogHist.p: Jenny Simmons worked as a freelance oral history interviewer for two National Life Stories projects: Artist's Lives and Book Trade Lives.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: National Life Stories, oral history fieldwork charity

descriptiveNote.p: Jenny Simmons worked as a freelance oral history interviewer for National Life Stories.
